commit.message: Suppress throwing exceptions while deleting files
Add copyright header; ensure headless mode (for macOS)
Remove printing number of loader threads in each snapshot
Add comments to clarify how thread snapshots are captured

Use > 2 condition for error case

There could be two file loader threads active. It depends on
when the currently running thread is interrupted. To avoid false
failures, only snapshots with more than 2 file loader threads
are considered as failure.

For easier failure analysis, the number of snapshots
with 1, 2 and more loader threads is printed to the console.

Add a test for JDK-8325179: count FilesLoader threads

The test is based on BasicDirectoryModel/ConcurrentModification.java,
JDK-8327137.

The test starts several threads which simultaneously call
fileChooser.rescanCurrentDirectory. After a short delay, it takes
a snapshot of running threads. Then it verifies there are no more than
1 thread with the name of "Basic L&F File Loading Thread" in each
snapshot.
